response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the value it brings to its owner, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
